00022 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Logger_DB {
00023         
00031         public function log(&$gp,$settings) {
00032                 
00033                 //set params
00034                 $table = "tx_mailformplusplus_log";
00035                 $fields['ip'] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR');
00036                 $fields['tstamp'] = time();
00037                 $fields['crdate'] = time();
00038                 $fields['pid'] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00039                 $keys = array_keys($gp);
00040                 ksort($gp);
00041                 sort($keys);
00042                 $serialized = serialize($gp);
00043                 $hash = hash("md5",serialize($keys));
00044                 $fields['params'] = $serialized;
00045                 $fields['key_hash'] = $hash;
00046                 
00047                 $fields = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->fullQuoteArray($fields,$table);
00048                 
00049                 //query the database
00050                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery($table,$fields);
00051                 if($res && !$settings['nodebug']) {
00052                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Logged into table \"".$table."\". Inserted fields: ".implode(",",$fields),false);
00053                 } elseif(!$settings['nodebug']) {
00054                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Failed to log into table \"".$table."\". Inserted fields: ".implode(",",$fields),false);
00055                 }
00056         }
00057         
00058 }
00059 ?>
